column5: Hadn't seen this before, sorry if it's already been posted. It's a trailer that becomes its own boat.  http://tetrapodtrailer.com   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AgY4YTQcJMM
There was one at the sportsman show. They are made in stoney creek.. it seems like a solid unit but it's a bit expensive ..
Doesn't look like it would be road legal but load it up with decoys and it would be a dandy back country duck boat for beaver ponds and such if you got an ATV.
you can buy it with road axle and tires or off road way cool but way too much money
"Can't help paint Honey, I just have to take a load with the atv and I might not be back until late."

you can buy it with road axle and tires or off road way cool but way too much money   Do you know how much exactly?  Cool idea but wouldn't make a lot of sense if it is significantly more expensive than a 14ft aluminum/jon boat
over 4000 bucks   Yup, thats aggressive. Thanks Terry
I could build for less Im sure.
"Could" there is not, "do" there is only padewon! When done pictures post you will... (betcha do a much better job at it too!)  Michael
now if was 14 foot jon boat well then its a three in one add a mattress and you have a camper
